Topic.Title: Display the map AND a framed picture

Posts.EditableText:
Hi,

As the title says, I'd like to display the map of the game, but also would like to use the "set frame picture" function, wich is supposed to show the picture above the text. Unfortunately, the map overwrites it and it's not possible to show both. 

I don't see a lot of solutions. Is there a way to move the map and show it under the compass ? (right panel)

Thanks.
